title: Monsplode Modules
description:
This mod includes 2 regular modules with a needy sister module.
On "Monsplode, Fight!" you have to deal the highest possible damage to your opponent.
On "Monsplode Trading Cards" you have to accept or decline trading offers according to the card values.
On "Who's that Monsplode?" you have to find the name of a Monsplode by looking at it's shadow.
